Appearance

On this page

Local Endpoints (loopback / LAN) ‚Äã

Quick launcher for services when running the stack locally on this machine. All links are http://localhost and assume default ports and the current compose files. If a link 404s, check that the service is up with docker ps and that Traefik isn‚Äôt overriding ports.

Core automation ‚Äã

  • Prowlarr: http://localhost:9696
  • Sonarr: http://localhost:8989
  • Radarr: http://localhost:7878
  • Lidarr: http://localhost:8686
  • Whisparr: http://localhost:6969
  • SABnzbd: http://localhost:8080
  • Transmission: http://localhost:9091
  • Aria2 (RPC only): http://localhost:6800/jsonrpc

Comics / books ‚Äã

  • Mylar: http://localhost:8090
  • Komga: http://localhost:8081
  • Komf (Komelia UI): http://localhost:8085
  • Kavita: http://localhost:5000
  • Audiobookshelf: http://localhost:13378

Requests / oversight ‚Äã

  • Overseerr: http://localhost:5055
  • Bazarr: http://localhost:6767
  • Netdata: http://localhost:19999
  • Portainer: http://localhost:9000
  • Tdarr server: http://localhost:8265
  • Tdarr node: http://localhost:8266

Ingress / docs ‚Äã

  • Traefik dashboard: http://localhost:8082 (disabled/not routed)
  • Docs (VitePress dev/preview): http://localhost:4173

Media servers ‚Äã

  • Plex (primary): http://localhost:32400
  • Stash: http://localhost:9998

Notes ‚Äã

  • Torrent traffic is direct (no VPN) in this snapshot.
  • If you override ports or enable Traefik host rules, update this page accordingly.
